pullRequest.title: Add support for throwable projectiles items
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
This PR adds support for getting an manipulating the item of a throwable projectile (snowball, enderpearl etc.)

Target Minecraft Versions: 1.15.2+
Requirements: 1.15.2+
Related Issues: none

commit.message: Add support for the item of throwable projectiles

nodes.bodyText: correct me if i'm wrong, but couldn't you do projectile.getItem().getAmount() and project.getItem().setAmount(amount)
